headline: T. Rowe Price Taps Giving And 401(k) Insights For Advisor Loyalty
summary: T. Rowe Price Group (NasdaqGS:TROW) introduced "The Generosity Effect," a new research and advisor resource program focused on charitable giving. The company released its latest Reference Point 401(k) benchmarking report, providing fresh data on retirement plan design and participant behavior. Together, these initiatives are aimed at helping financial advisors strengthen client relationships around philanthropy and retirement planning. T. Rowe Price Group, known primarily for its asset...
